name: ai-knowledge-hub
description: MCP server that provides unified access to organizational knowledge across multiple platforms (local docs, Guru, Notion)
author: Maplefjord

scripts.build: tsc && chmod +x dist/index.js && mkdir -p dist/docs && cp -R ./docs dist/
scripts.inspect: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node dist/index.js
scripts.inspect:ui: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node dist/index.js
scripts.inspect:cli: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector --cli node dist/index.js
scripts.inspect:cli:resources: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector --cli node dist/index.js --method resources/list
scripts.inspect:cli:tools: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector --cli node dist/index.js --method tools/list
scripts.inspect:cli:test: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector --cli node dist/index.js --method resources/list && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector --cli node dist/index.js --method tools/list
scripts.inspect:cli:hello: npm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector --cli node dist/index.js --method tools/call --tool-name hello --tool-arg name="Developer"
scripts.test:inspector: npm run build && npm run inspect:cli:test && npm run inspect:cli:hello
scripts.validate: npm run build && npm run inspect:cli:tools && npm run inspect:cli:hello
